name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water for 10-12 minutes or until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic and cook until soft and translucent.
Add beef mince and cook until browned.
Add canned tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes or until the sauce has thickened.
Serve spaghetti topped with Bolognese sauce.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, cut into small pieces
instructions: Heat vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium heat.
Add onion, garlic, and ginger and cook until softened.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add curry powder and cumin and cook until fragrant.
Add coconut milk and water and bring to a simmer.
Simmer for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.
Stir in frozen peas and cook until heated through.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

name: Tiramisu
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pan of salted boiling water for 10-12 minutes, or until al dente.
Meanwhile, make the pesto. Put the basil, pine nuts, garlic and Parmesan in a food processor and blend until finely chopped.
With the motor running, slowly pour in the olive oil until you have a smooth, thick paste.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving a cupful of the cooking water. Return the spaghetti to the pan and toss with the pesto, adding a little of the cooking water to loosen if necessary.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water for 10-12 minutes or until al dente.
Meanwhile, blend basil, pine nuts, garlic, olive oil, and Parmesan cheese in a food processor until smooth.
Season with salt and black pepper, to taste.
Drain pasta and return it to the pot.
Add the pesto sauce and toss until evenly coated.
Serve with extra Parmesan cheese and freshly ground black pepper.

name: Beef Stir Fry
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together cornstarch, soy sauce, honey, rice vinegar, and sesame oil.
Season beef with salt and black pepper, to taste.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add beef and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes or until browned.
Add bell peppers, onion, and garlic and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Add the soy sauce mixture and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes or until the sauce has thickened and coats the beef and vegetables.
Serve with rice or noodles.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan/gas 6.
Season chicken with salt and black pepper, to taste.
Coat each chicken breast in flour, shaking off any excess.
Dip in beaten eggs, then coat in breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan cheese, oregano, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper.
Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken breasts and cook for 3-4

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan/gas 6.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes or until fragrant.
Add spinach and sauté for 3-4 minutes or until wilted.
Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese and parsley.
Season chicken with salt and black pepper, to taste.
Cut a slit horizontally into each chicken breast, being careful not to cut all the way through.
Stuff each chicken breast with the spinach and feta mixture.
Place the stuffed chicken breasts on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes or until cooked through.
Serve hot.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
instructions: Spread peanut butter on one slice of bread.
Spread jelly or jam on the other slice of bread.
Put the two slices of bread together, with the peanut butter and jelly sides facing each other.
Cut the sandwich in half or into quarters, if desired.

name: Greek Salad
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: In a large salad bowl, combine chopped lettuce, diced cucumber, sliced onion, chopped bell pepper, and Kalamata olives.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, salt, and black pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese over the top of the salad.
Serve immediately.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: Salt and black pepper, to taste
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add beef and cook for 2-3 minutes or until browned.
Remove beef from skillet and set aside.
Add onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook for 3-4 minutes or until softened.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Sprinkle flour over the vegetables and stir to combine.
Gradually pour in beef broth, stirring constantly to prevent lumps.
Bring mixture to a simmer and cook for 5-7 minutes or until thickened.
Stir in sour cream and chopped parsley.
Season with salt and black pepper, to taste.
Serve beef stroganoff over cooked egg noodles.

name: Banana Bread
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped walnuts or pecans, optional
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, beat together butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract, and beat until well combined.
Stir in mashed bananas.
Gradually add the flour mixture to the banana mixture, stirring until just combined.
Fold in chopped nuts, if using.
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.
Allow to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing and cooling completely on a wire rack.
